name: Guard Exempt
description:
Guard Exempt Story

You are a guard inside a huge dungeon, but you are too curious to stay in there for eternity, so you decide to escape. However, the other enemies guarding the treasure won't let you escape that easily. Your only option now is to fight to the death.

Gameplay

Survive the many waves of enemies using your weapons. Every note, you shoot, so your only task is to aim and dodge.

Content
  • 3 main levels with unique enemies, weapons, and environments.
  • 5 different enemies.
  • 4 unique weapons.
  • Total of 6 songs (+4 premade ones).
Controls

Aim with your mouse. WASD to move. RMB/Space to dash.

Rhythm Jam

This game was created for the Rhythm Jam 2021 hosted by Harman Kamboj, Arcy, and SkyanSam. The theme for the jam was Every ___. The time limit was 8 days. This is a solo entry and there are no premade assets, except for the 4 bonus songs.

Music

Main Songs:

  • Agent_Jo - Guard Exempt (Main Theme)
  • Agent_Jo - Level Select
  • Agent_Jo - Tutorial
  • Agent_Jo - Ascend
  • Agent_Jo - Magmatic Momentum
  • Agent_Jo - Static Tracks

Bonus Songs (premade):

  • Agent_Jo - Sprint (Single - Link)*
  • Agent_Jo - Skyline Flash ("Road into the Sun" - unpublished)*
  • Agent_Jo - Shockwave (Single - Link)*
  • Agent_Jo - Space Trial ("Space Trial" - unpublished)

*re-arranged
